documents.title: no dilemma over horns
text: at the british museum 's viking exhibition in 2014 , visitors were told not expect to see any helmets with horns .
apparently , those were the invention of 19th century story illustrators .
but it 's a different story at the museum 's forthcoming celts exhibition , which opens in september .
among the exhibits will be this celtic bronze horned helmet , which dates from between 200bc to 50 bc and was dredged up from the thames at waterloo bridge in london .
also on display will be four gold neck ornaments , or torcs , found by an amateur treasure hunter in a field near stirling in scotland in september 2009 .
amazingly , david booth was on his first outing with a metal-detector - and he found the trove only seven steps from his car .

documents.title: goosebumps trailer arrives
text: rl stine 's goosebumps books were a publishing phenomenon in the 1990s .
the series were translated into 32 languages and spawned a tv series .
so it 's not a surprise to learn the horror fiction saga has been turned into a film - albeit one that takes an unusual approach to the source material .
jack black plays a reclusive , nervy version of the real rl stine , who keeps his manuscripts locked away .
when one of them is accidentally opened , all manner of strange and mythical creatures are unleashed on the world - prompting a mad rush to contain the damage .
the first trailer has just arrived , though the film itself is not out until next february .

documents.title: to share six nations coverage
text: the bbc and itv will share the rights to broadcast rugby union 's six nations championship for the next six years .
wales , scotland and france home matches will be on the bbc , while itv will show england , ireland and italy home games .
the unlikely alliance allowed the two terrestrial broadcasters to outbid sky for the television rights .
radio 5 live will continue live commentary of all matches , which can also be accessed via the bbc sport website .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: disney wins domain name battle
text: earlier we published some photos of fans arriving at this year 's comic-con convention in san diego in all their `` cosplay '' finery .
they clearly taking their costumes very seriously - and so , apparently , does disney now it 's the parent company of star wars makers lucasfilm .
a berkshire-based fancy-dress retailer is being made to surrender the starwars.co.uk web address , a domain name it has owned for more than a decade .
the british company uses the address as a way to direct shoppers to a section of its jokers ' masquerade store dedicated to star wars-themed costumes .
disney asked the costume store 's own parent company , abscissa , to surrender the domain name last year , but abscissa refused .
after a three-month process , though , nominet - which oversees.uk domains - has ruled it can no longer use the starwars.co.uk web address , along with six other similar domain names .

documents.title: rodin sculpture returned
text: a rare auguste rodin sculpture stolen nearly 25 years ago has been recovered after it turned up in london .

young girl with serpent ( 1886 ) , estimated to be worth around $ 100,000 ( £ 65,000 ) , was looted from a beverly hills mansion in 1991 along with other works of art valued at more than $ 1m ( £ 650,000 ) .
the heist was facilitated by the housekeeper of a los angeles art collector who was paid $ 5,000 by art thieves to give them copies of his house keys .
the housekeeper was later arrested while sunbathing by a pool in miami - but the whereabouts of the rodin remained unknown until it turned up at christie 's auction house in 2011 .
there was a four-year tussle between lawyers representing the collector who offered the sculpture to christie 's and the original owner - but it has now been released back to her .
other works stolen in 1991 , including an early sketch of rodin 's the kiss and another sculpture , the eternal spring , have not been recovered .
young girl with serpent is due to be auctioned later this year to offset the owner 's insurance costs .

text: the makers of the james bond films have denied giving permission for a broadway musical about ian fleming 's famous character .

their statement follows reports that merry saltzman - whose late father harry produced nine bond films with albert r broccoli - had secured the rights to produce a stage show she said would be called james bond : the musical .
in a statement , released on the
`` danjaq and mgm jointly control all live stage rights in the bond franchise , and therefore no james bond stage show may be produced without their permission , '' the statement continues .

documents.title: happy hockney day
text: in honour of david hockney 's 78th birthday , here are five quirky facts about britain 's most influential living artist .
1 ) he sold his first painting for £ 10
in 2009 , hockney 's painting beverly hills housewife
portrait of my father ( 1955 ) was shown at a regional art fair in leeds with no price set , but then an unexpected potential buyer appeared .
since his father had bought the canvas , hockney wanted to clear the sale with him first .
his father advised him to take the money , saying : `` you can do another . ''
2 ) he may have synesthesia
synesthesia is a condition in which the stimulation of one sense leads to the automatic and involuntary experience of a second .
hockney says he may have it , based on his experiences of designing stage sets .
`` in all operas i 've done , the music gives me the set , the colour and the shape , '' he said .
`` in [ stravinsky 's ] oedipus rex , there was not much colour , but lines and sharp things which suggested cross hatchings . ''
3 ) he likes to watch himself draw
in recent years hockney has created hundreds of artworks
he says one of the main benefits is being able to watch back the drawing process as an animation .
`` normally you do n't watch yourself draw when you are drawing , because you are always a few moves ahead , ''
`` the only thing like it is that great picasso film where he 's drawing - and he realises it was n't the finished drawing he was doing that was the subject , it was what he was doing . ''
4 ) he says art schools are neglecting drawing
`` people had been drawing for 40,000 years , and they gave it up in 1975 .
it 's almost funny , ''
5 ) he feels gay culture has changed for the worse
`` i suppose it 's that [ gay men today ] want to be ordinary - they want to fit in , ''
`` well , i did n't care about that .
i did n't care about fitting in .
everywhere is so conservative . ''

text: tv presenter giuliana rancic is stepping down as an anchor of e !
news after 10 years .
the nightly showbiz news show will continue with her co-host terence jenkins .
no replacement for rancic has been announced .

the comments were branded racist , and rancic 's co-hosts kelly osbourne and kathy griffin later quit the show .

documents.title: tomei could be spidey 's aunt may
text: oscar-winning actress marisa tomei is reportedly in talks to play the role of aunt may in the new spider-man movie .
an offer was made to the my cousin vinny and the wrestler star last week , according to industry insiders .
if tomei accepts the role , she will be the youngest-ever aunt may to appear on film .

the 50-year-old is 37 years younger than british actress rosemary harris , who starred in sam raimi 's spider-man trilogy , and 18 years the junior of sally field , who appeared in the amazing spider-man and its sequel .
the new spider-man , britain 's tom holland , is expected to make his debut in 2016 's captain america : civil war , with a stand-alone film to follow in july 2017 .

documents.title: selleck in hot water ?
text: magnum pi and blue bloods actor tom selleck has been accused of stealing water for his ranch in parched california by raiding a public hydrant .

the calleguas municipal water district in ventura county claims a tanker truck filled up more than a dozen times over the past two years before delivering the water to selleck 's nearby ranch , where he grows avocados .
representatives for selleck have yet to comment on the matter .
water theft is obviously a serious issue , though one of the many twitter accounts dedicated to selleck 's famously bushy moustache has managed to find some humour in the allegations .

documents.title: ac/dc drummer sentenced to house detention
text: ac/dc drummer phil rudd has been sentenced to eight months in house detention for drug possession and making threats to kill one of his employees .
during the hearing , tauranga district court judge thomas ingram said rudd had a limited criminal history and posed a low risk of reoffending .
but he rejected the 61-year-old 's argument that he would lose millions of dollars if convicted .
`` some of the affidavit material put before me suggests that you are integral to the band 's sound and you are an iconographical member of the band , '' he said .
`` that point does n't persuade me completely .
queen have replaced freddie mercury and it 's clear that the band is currently touring without you . ''
ac/dc is currently employing welsh drummer chris slade for its rock or bust tour , but has n't said if that 's a long-term arrangement .

documents.title: hunger games finale teased
text: ahead of the hunger games panel at comic-con , the franchise 's star jennifer lawrence has uploaded a teaser trailer for the final film in the series to her official facebook page .
for the uninitiated , the trailer shows rebellion leader katniss everdeen standing atop a statue that symbolises the impoverished district 12 , home of an uprising against the capitol .
the final message - `` stand by for a message from district 13 '' - refers to a district believed to have been destroyed during an earlier rebellion .
the hunger games : mockingjay - part 2 will be out pretty much everywhere on or around 18 november .

documents.title: doctor who gets bricked
text: lego dimensions is a new video game that mashes up a whole host of pop culture characters , from batman to scooby-doo via back to the future 's marty mcfly .

documents.title: douglas makes premiere a family affair
text: here 's actor michael douglas , his wife catherine zeta-jones and their children dylan and carys at last night 's european premiere of ant-man , the latest comic book blockbuster from the marvel empire .
douglas stars in the film as a scientist who invents a suit that can shrink its wearer down to , yes , the size of an ant , while paul rudd ( below ) plays a cat burglar who gets to try it on .

insects aside , the event was attended by the film 's director , peyton reed , as well as rudd and douglas 's co-star , michael pena .
pena 's performance is one of the highlights in an entertaining film that should perform well at the box office , if not quite as robustly as marvel 's recent avengers : age of ultron .
